      • onShowRowDetails

        protected void onShowRowDetails()

      • resizeColumns

        protected void resizeColumns()
        Set the width of the columns as percentages.

        This method calculates column widths based on the percentage values provided in the constructor. If no percentage is specified for a column, a default percentage is calculated. The method ensures minimum column widths for usability and handles edge cases gracefully.

        Parameters:
        ce - ChangeEvent from viewport (can be null for direct calls)
